RawLine: TNPC_31055001,先去向{color=#cc0000}正哥{/color}買{color=#cc0000}麵粉{/color}，再去{color=#cc0000}酒館{/color}找{color=#cc0000}龐大娘{/color}吧。,先去向{color=#cc0000}正哥{/color}买{color=#cc0000}面粉{/color}，再去{color=#cc0000}酒馆{/color}找{color=#cc0000}庞大娘{/color}吧。

Items.mt: Go to buy flour from Zheng first, and then go to the pub to find Pang Da Niang.
